about_the_game:
Escape the sewer

Do you have what it takes to reach the top? In Septic, you are thrust into the depths of an underground sewer system. With its responsive controls and demanding jumps, this first-person platformer will test your agility and precision at every turn. Navigate through treacherous environments and aim to escape the murky depths.

Don't fall

A single misstep could lead to a devastating fall, costing you tons of progress. The stakes are high, and the margin for error is slim. Each jump must be perfectly timed and executed. Stay focused and don’t let the pressure get to you, or you might find yourself back at the bottom, starting all over again.

Master the Mechanics
Septic challenges you to master its intricate mechanics. Every movement, from the simplest jump to the most complex maneuver, requires precision and skill. The responsive controls are designed to give you full command over your actions, allowing you to hone your abilities and achieve perfection. Practice makes perfect, and perfection is the key to survival.

Endure the Challenge
Prepare yourself for an intense and unforgiving journey. Septic ramps up the difficulty as you progress, presenting you with relentless obstacles and increasingly complex levels. Your perseverance and determination will be tested like never before. Only the most resilient players will endure the challenge and emerge victorious.

name: Septic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1660
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1080
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Septic is a gripping precision platformer where you navigate an underground sewer, mastering challenging jumps and dealing with significant setbacks. Test your skills and perseverance in this intense escape adventure.
